com.gwt.ss.client

Interface GwtLogin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

    public interface GwtLogin
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService
    <form-login> for Gwt, instantiate a GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority is needed.
    This interface did not annotated with @RemoteServiceRelativePath, Do not generate instance by GWT.create, Just invoke GwtLoginAsync.Util.getInstance instead.
    GWT用來進行<form-login>的服務界面，必須建立一 GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority 實例
    本界面並未標記@RemoteServiceRelativePath，所以不要用 GWT.create建立intance，請改用 GwtLoginAsync.Util.getInstance
